controls.title: Canonical schema identification
controls.description: Schemas declare $schema and stable $id identifiers to enable deterministic external referencing and toolchain resolution.

controls.title: Example-backed validation discipline
controls.description: Each schema has a corresponding example payload that validates in CI, preventing regressions and ensuring implementer-ready samples.

controls.title: Machine-readable conformance declaration
controls.description: Implementers can publish conformance claims in a structured JSON format validated by the repository schema.

controls.title: DTG endorsement credential
controls.description: Defines and constrains the DTG endorsement-credential credential structure for interoperable issuance and verification.
